{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Firebox-t30-ft.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = WatchGuard Firebox T30 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = WatchGuard_Firebox_T30 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox T30 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = BS3AE5 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router, security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1011; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 533 / 667 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320EBTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = ADATA;; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M8IN-DI; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6171R; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.12;; |stockos = Linux;3.12.19-rt30;;
|exp_if_types = SD Card slot, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, power switch, heatsink, PoE |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, RS-232 transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24C02C;;1;,,, 1A 36V Buck LED Driver;Diodes Inc;AL8807;;1;,,, Mixed-Signal Microcontroller;TI;MSP430G2303;;1;,,, 3A 150V P-Channel QFET;Fairchild;FDMC2523P;;1;,,, Octal Transparent D-Type Latch;TI;SN74LVC373A;;1;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4850EY;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;1;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, Low-Power Quad-Channel Digital Isolator;Skyworks;Si8641;;1;,,, 4.5-18V 5A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54527;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller & Card Reader;Alcor Micro;AU6259;;1;,,, Advanced Current-Mode Active-Clamp PWM Controller;TI;UCC2897A;;1;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device 1-port PSE Manager;Microsemi;PD69101;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 10.0.1.0 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 12/31/2022 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06XD45PD3 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 [[PowerPC]] (@800MHz) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 48V, 1.25A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/Firebox_T30_T50_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] *[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/QSG_Firebox_T30_T50.pdf Quick Start Guide]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:WatchGuard Firebox T30 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox T30 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
